verses.verse: Moreover, the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"And you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> up a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H6865>Tyre;<s%>

and <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> who <S%H3427>dwells<s%> at the <S%H3996>entrance<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H7402>merchant<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> to <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H339>coastlands,<s%>' <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "O <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> you have <S%H559>said,<s%> 'I am <S%H3632>perfect<s%> in <S%H3308>beauty.<s%>'
"Your <S%H1366>borders<s%> are in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas;<s%> Your <S%H1129>builders<s%> have <S%H3634>perfected<s%> your <S%H3308>beauty.<s%>

"They have <S%H1129>made<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> [your] <S%H3871>planks<s%> of <S%H1265>fir<s%> <S%H1265>trees<s%> from <S%H8149>Senir;<s%> They have <S%H3947>taken<s%> a <S%H730>cedar<s%> from <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H8650>mast<s%> for you.

"Of <S%H437>oaks<s%> from <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> they have <S%H6213>made<s%> your <S%H9295>oars;<s%> With <S%H8127>ivory<s%> they have <S%H6213>inlaid<s%> your <S%H7175>deck<s%> of <S%H839>boxwood<s%> from the <S%H339>coastlands<s%> of <S%H3794>Cyprus.<s%>

"Your <S%H4666>sail<s%> was of <S%H8336>fine<s%> <S%H7553>embroidered<s%> <S%H8336>linen<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> So that it <S%H1961>became<s%> your <S%H5251>distinguishing<s%> <S%H5251>mark;<s%> Your <S%H4374>awning<s%> was <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> from the <S%H339>coastlands<s%> of <S%H473>Elishah.<s%>

"The <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon<s%> and <S%H719>Arvad<s%> were your <S%H9588>rowers;<s%> Your <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>men,<s%> O <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> were aboard; they were your <S%H2259>pilots.<s%>

"The <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H1380>Gebal<s%> and her <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>men<s%> were with you <S%H2388>repairing<s%> your <S%H919>seams;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H591>ships<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> and their <S%H4419>sailors<s%> were with you in order to <S%H6148>deal<s%> in your <S%H4627>merchandise.<s%>

<S%H6539>"Persia<s%> and <S%H3865>Lud<s%> and <S%H6316>Put<s%> were in your <S%H2428>army,<s%> your <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war.<s%> They <S%H8518>hung<s%> <S%H4043>shield<s%> and <S%H3553>helmet<s%> in you; they <S%H5414>set<s%> forth your <S%H1926>splendor.<s%>

"The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H719>Arvad<s%> and your <S%H2428>army<s%> were on your <S%H2346>walls,<s%> [all] <S%H5439>around,<s%> and the <S%H1575>Gammadim<s%> were in your <S%H4026>towers.<s%> They <S%H8518>hung<s%> their <S%H7982>shields<s%> on your <S%H2346>walls,<s%> [all] <S%H5439>around;<s%> they <S%H3634>perfected<s%> your <S%H3308>beauty.<s%>

<S%H8659>"Tarshish<s%> was your <S%H5503>customer<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> [kinds] of <S%H1952>wealth;<s%> with <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H1270>iron,<s%> <S%H913>tin,<s%> and <S%H5777>lead,<s%> they <S%H5414>paid<s%> for your <S%H5801>wares.<s%>

<S%H3120>"Javan,<s%> <S%H8422>Tubal,<s%> and <S%H4902>Meshech,<s%> they were your <S%H7402>traders;<s%> with the <S%H5315>lives<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> and <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze<s%> they <S%H5414>paid<s%> for your <S%H4627>merchandise.<s%>
"Those from Beth-togarmah <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H9463>war<s%> <S%H9463>horses<s%> and <S%H6505>mules<s%> for your <S%H5801>wares.<s%>

"The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1719>Dedan<s%> were your <S%H7402>traders.<s%> <S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H339>coastlands<s%> were your <S%H5506>market;<s%> <S%H8127>ivory<s%> <S%H7161>tusks<s%> and <S%H1894>ebony<s%> they <S%H7725>brought<s%> as your <S%H814>payment.<s%>

<S%H758>"Aram<s%> was your <S%H5503>customer<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of your <S%H4639>goods;<s%> they <S%H5414>paid<s%> for your <S%H5801>wares<s%> with <S%H5306>emeralds,<s%> <S%H713>purple,<s%> <S%H7553>embroidered<s%> <S%H7553>work,<s%> <S%H948>fine<s%> <S%H948>linen,<s%> <S%H7215>coral,<s%> and <S%H3539>rubies.<s%>

<S%H3063>"Judah<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> they were your <S%H7402>traders;<s%> with the <S%H2406>wheat<s%> of <S%H4511>Minnith,<s%> <S%H6436>cakes,<s%> <S%H1706>honey,<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H6875>balm<s%> they <S%H5414>paid<s%> for your <S%H4627>merchandise.<s%>

<S%H1834>"Damascus<s%> was your <S%H5503>customer<s%> because of the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of your <S%H4639>goods,<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> [kinds] of <S%H1952>wealth,<s%> because of the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of <S%H2463>Helbon<s%> and <S%H6713>white<s%> <S%H6785>wool.<s%>

<S%H2051>"Vedan<s%> and <S%H3120>Javan<s%> <S%H5414>paid<s%> for your <S%H5801>wares<s%> from <S%H187>Uzal;<s%> <S%H6219>wrought<s%> <S%H1270>iron,<s%> <S%H6916>cassia,<s%> and <S%H7070>sweet<s%> <S%H7070>cane<s%> were among your <S%H4627>merchandise.<s%>
<S%H1719>"Dedan<s%> <S%H7402>traded<s%> with you in <S%H2667>saddlecloths<s%> <S%H899><s%> for <S%H7396>riding.<s%>

<S%H6152>"Arabia<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> they were your <S%H5503>customers<s%> for <S%H3733>lambs,<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> and <S%H6260>goats;<s%> for these they were your <S%H5503>customers.<s%>

"The <S%H7402>traders<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> and <S%H7484>Raamah,<s%> they <S%H7402>traded<s%> with you; they <S%H5414>paid<s%> for your <S%H5801>wares<s%> with the <S%H7218>best<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> [kinds] of <S%H1314>spices,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> [kinds] of <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
<S%H2771>"Haran,<s%> <S%H3656>Canneh,<s%> <S%H5729>Eden,<s%> the <S%H7402>traders<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba,<s%> <S%H804>Asshur,<s%> [and] <S%H3638>Chilmad<s%> <S%H7402>traded<s%> with you.

"They <S%H7402>traded<s%> with you in <S%H4360>choice<s%> <S%H4360>garments,<s%> in <S%H1545>clothes<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H7553>embroidered<s%> <S%H7553>work,<s%> and in <S%H1595>carpets<s%> of <S%H1264>many<s%> <S%H1264>colors,<s%> [and] <S%H9029>tightly<s%> <S%H2280>wound<s%> <S%H9112>cords,<s%> [which were] among your <S%H4819>merchandise.<s%>

"The <S%H591>ships<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> were the <S%H7788>carriers<s%> for your <S%H4627>merchandise.<s%> And you were <S%H4390>filled<s%> and were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3513>glorious<s%> In the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas.<s%>

"Your <S%H9588>rowers<s%> have <S%H935>brought<s%> you Into <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters;<s%> The <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> has <S%H7665>broken<s%> you In the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas.<s%>

"Your <S%H1952>wealth,<s%> your <S%H5801>wares,<s%> your <S%H4627>merchandise,<s%> Your <S%H4419>sailors,<s%> and your <S%H2259>pilots,<s%> Your <S%H2388>repairers<s%> of <S%H919>seams,<s%> your <S%H6148>dealers<s%> in <S%H4627>merchandise,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are in you, With <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6951>company<s%> that is in your <S%H8432>midst,<s%> Will <S%H5307>fall<s%> into the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%> On the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H4658>overthrow.<s%>
"At the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H2201>cry<s%> of your <S%H2259>pilots<s%> The <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> will <S%H7493>shake.<s%>

"And <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H8610>handle<s%> the <S%H4880>oar,<s%> The <S%H4419>sailors,<s%> [and] <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2259>pilots<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> Will <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from their <S%H591>ships;<s%> They will <S%H5975>stand<s%> on the <S%H776>land,<s%>

And they will <S%H8085>make<s%> their <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you And will <S%H2199>cry<s%> <S%H4751>bitterly.<s%> They will <S%H5927>cast<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> They will <S%H6428>wallow<s%> in <S%H665>ashes.<s%>

"Also they will <S%H7139>make<s%> themselves <S%H7139>bald<s%> <S%H7144><s%> for you And <S%H2296>gird<s%> themselves with <S%H8242>sackcloth;<s%> And they will <S%H1058>weep<s%> for you in <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of <S%H5315>soul<s%> With <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H4553>mourning.<s%>

"Moreover, in their <S%H5092>wailing<s%> they will <S%H5375>take<s%> up a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> for you And <S%H6969>lament<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you: <S%H4310>'Who<s%> is like <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> Like her <S%H1822>who<s%> is <S%H1822>silent<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>?

'When your <S%H5801>wares<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out from the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> You <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> With the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of your <S%H1952>wealth<s%> and your <S%H4627>merchandise<s%> You <S%H6238>enriched<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H6256>'Now<s%> that you are <S%H7665>broken<s%> by the <S%H3220>seas<s%> In the <S%H4615>depths<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> Your <S%H4627>merchandise<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6951>company<s%> Have <S%H5307>fallen<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of you.

<S%H3605>'All<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H339>coastlands<s%> Are <S%H8074>appalled<s%> at you, And their <S%H4428>kings<s%> are <S%H9623>horribly<s%> <S%H8175>afraid;<s%> They are <S%H7481>troubled<s%> in <S%H6440>countenance.<s%>

'The <S%H5503>merchants<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H8319>hiss<s%> at you; You have <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H1091>terrified,<s%> And you will be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>more<s%><S%H5704>.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>' "'"
